channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- wildfly-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- wildfly-core

item.title: CVE-2020-25689|2024-08-04T15:40:36.775Z -- red%20hat -- wildfly-core
item.description: A memory leak flaw was found in WildFly in all versions up to 21.0.0.Final, where host-controller tries to reconnect in a loop, generating new connections which are not properly closed while not able to connect to domain-controller. This flaw allows an attacker to cause an Out of memory (OOM) issue, leading to a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
